thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: U.K. Retail Sector Shows Bright Spots as M&A Intrigue Intensifies

author: David Hodari
title: U.K. Retail Sector Shows Bright Spots as M&A Intrigue Intensifies
text:
Bad news continued to mount in the U.S. retail real-estate industry last week as GGP Inc. accepted Brookfield Property Partners LP’s low-ball offer and new statistics showed vacancies in the regional mall sector hitting a six-year high.
In the U.K., though, a tangle of takeover offers made in recent months—with Hammerson PLC in the middle—have highlighted the value investors still see in the most popular shopping centers.
France’s Klépierre...
